headline: Iyaphokoka imiyalezo yovelwano emva kokusweleka kukaMfundisi Stofile
text:
IYAPHOKOKA imiyalezo yovelwano ejoliswe kusapho lakwaStofile emva kokusweleka kwegqala lomzabalazo wenkululeko yeli uMfundisi Makhenkesi Stofile. UStofile usweleke ngentseni yanamhlanje, akukabikho lwazi lithe vetshe ngokusweleka kwakhe.  
Inkulumbuso yeMpuma Koloni uPhumulo Masualle umchaze okaStofile ngelithi, “Obezinikele ekusebenzeleni uluntu, ukususela ngexesha awathi wazibandakanya nomzabalazo wenkululeko eselula.” Nomongameli weli uJacob Zuma, ugxwale emswaneni, emchaza okaStofile njengomntu obezinikele kwinkonzo yoluntu, kungekho luxanduva alijongele phantsi. Emva kokuzibandakanya kwakhe nomzabalazo wenkululeko yeli, kwanokuvunyelwa kwemibutho yopolitiko yabantsundu kweli uStofile ubambe izikhundla eziliqela kumbutho weANC nakwinkonzo yoluntu.  
Wabekwa njengenkulumbuso yephondo leMpuma Koloni ukususela ngonyaka ka1999 ukuya ku2004. Emva koko wayishiya ipolitiki yephondo, wayinxalenye yabathunywa beliphondo beANC ePalamente kazwelonke, nalapho watyunjwa njengomphathiswa wezemidlalo kweli loMzantsi Afrika ukusuela ngo2004 ukuya ku 2010. OkaStofile ube ngunozakuzaku weli kwelase Jamani emva kokushiya isebe lezemidlalo. Ebutsheni balonyaka ubekwe njengentloko yeYunivesithi yaseFort Hare. Nemibutho yezemidlalo kweli equka iSARU ithumele imiyalezo yokugcwala emswaneni, neyovelwano kusapho lwakhe, nakumbutho kaKhongolose emva kokuba ethe walishiya eli.

headline: Urhulumente uceba izindlu neebhasari kwabenyhikityha yaseBhisho yango1992
text:
INKULUBAPHATHISWA uOscar Mabuyane uthi urhulumente ukwinkqubo yokunceda ngeenkonzo iintsapho zamaxhoba kwakunye nabo basinda kwinyhikityha yokubulawa kwabaqhankqalazi eBhisho ngo1992. 
Ngomhla wesixhenxe kweyoMsintsi 1992, amajoni karhulumente wephandle elalisaziwa njengeCiskei athulula iimbumbulu kubaqhankqalazi ababefuna kupheliswe inkqubo kazimelegeqe wela phandle. Oko kwabangela ukuba kubhubhe abantu abangamashumi amabini anesibhozo ze konzakala abangaphaya kwamakhulu amabini. 
NgoLwesibini urhulumente wephondo kuquka neentsapho zamaxhoba, kuquka nabo bathi basinda kule nyhikityha, bebekwisiza saseBhisho apho badutyulelwa khona abaqhankqalazi. 
“Kulo nyaka sikunyaka wamashumi amabini anesixhenxe kwidemokhrasi yethu kwaneminyaka engamashumi amabini anesithoba wenyhikityha yokubulawa kwabantu eBhisho,” utshilo uMabuyane. 
“Noxa nje sizenzile ezinye zezinto zokukhumbula abo babhubhela kule nyhikityha ngomhla wesixhenxe kweyoMsintsi [1992], sisenendlela ende ekufanele siyayihamba ukuze sixhamlise ngobomi obungcono kumntu wonke. 
“Singabokuqala ukuvuma ukuba bekufanele ukuba senze lukhulu ukunika imbeko egameni [labo badutyulwa kule nyhikityha],” kutsho uMabuyane. 
UMabuyane uthi “njengorhulumente okhathalayo, siyayiqonda eyokuba uninzi lwamaqhawe namaqhawekazi [la athi abhubha kule nyhikityha] ashiya ngasemva izalamane zilambatha”. 
“Siyalele urhulumente wephondo ukuba anike ingqwalasela abasindayo kwakunye neentsapho zamaxhoba ale nyhikityha mayelana neenkonzo ezifana nezindlu. Isebe lezobulungisa lixakekile yinkqubo yokunikeza iibhasari kubantwana bamaxhoba  kwanabo bathi bonzakala kule nyhikityha,” utshilo uMabuyane.

headline: Iyantlukwano kumasipala ngemeko yebala laseGlenmore
text:
INGQUMBO yabahlali baseGlenmore eNgqushwa malunga nento abayichaza njengokutyiwa kwemali eyayabelwe ukwakhiwa kwebala lezemidlalo kule lali, ibangele uqhekeko kumagosa omasipala waseNgqushwa. 
Yimali ekwizigidi ezithathu zeerandi eyachithwa ngethuba kuphuculwa ibala lezemidlalo laseGlenmore, kodwa ibala lashiyeka linenkunzana nengca eyenza kubenzima ukudlala.  
Ngaphambi kokulungiswa kweli bala kweyoMqungu ngo2016, abahlali baseGlenmore babebamba itumente rhoqo ngePasika kugcwala kuthi qhu ebaleni.  
Kodwa ngoku iphelile lo nto, kuba umasipala umoshe ibala endaweni yokulilungisa.  
Umsebenzi wokuphuculwa kweli bala wawunikwe inkampani kanondyebo weANC eAmathole uOnke Mgunculu, ebizwa njengeMgunculu Trading. 
Igosa lezonxibelelwano kumasipala waseNgqushwa uNcumisa Cakwe, wathi ibala ligqityiwe noxa nje abantu baseGlenmore bengakwazi ukulisebenzisa ngenxa yemeko embi. 
Kodwa kwiveki ephelileyo, uSomlomo waseNgqushwa uNombuyiselo Magingxa uthe imeko yeli bala ibangela umasipala abeyintlekisa. Oku kuza emva koqhankqalazo lwabahlali baseGlenmore neziphaluka abathi bafuna ingcaciso malunga nemeko yeli bala. 
“Siza kuziqwalasela izikhalazo zenu bahlali. Noko imeko yebala laseGlenmore iyasihlebisa singumasipala,” utshilo uMagingxa.  
Ngokwemigqaliselo yomsebenzi wokuphuculwa kweli bala, iMgunculu Trading kwakufanele yenze ezi zinto zilandelayo: Isango elitsha, izindlu zangasese zamadoda namakhosikazi, izindlu zokutshintsha zabadlali, ibala elitsha lebhola yomnyazi, ibala elitsha leBasket Ball, izitulo zokubukela, ibala leembaleki, ukufakela ingca yala maxesha, ukufakela izixhobo zokunkcenkceshela kwanokufakela imijelo yamanzi.  
Kodwa utyelelo lwephephandaba I’solezwe kule lali, lubonisa mfanekiso wumbi. Kutyelelo lwethu, sagangwa libala elingenamfaneleko wazigidi ezithathu. Abahlali banike lo masipala iiveki ezimbini ukuze aphendule kwizikhalazo zabo. Ngethuba esenza udliwanondlebe nephephandaba I’solezwe, uMgunculu wathi: “Umsebenzi ndawugqiba, ze ndanikeza ngesiqinisekiso (isatifiketi) esingqina ukuba umsebenzi ndiwugqibile ngo2016. Akunakugxekwa mna ngemeko yela bala elimoshwe ngabantu futhi liphinde lingakhathalelwa.” 
ULindokuhle Vellem, oligosa lakwaAfesis-corplan kwicandelo lokuhlolwa kwendlela azisa ngayo iinkonzo eluntwini urhulumente, uthi le ntshukumo yabahlali ifanele ukuba sisilumkiso kumasipala waseNgqushwa. “Into esivuyisayo kukuba abahlali baseNgqushwa, hayi eGlenmore kuphela, banolwazi oluphangeleleyo malunga namalungelo abo.”

headline: Bafuna usodolophu waseKSD ehle esikhundleni
text:
Abasebenzi bakaMasipala kumbutho weSAMWU bazimise ngxi iinkqubo zokusebenza kwiofisi zomasipala weKumkani Sabatha Dalindyebo kule veki. 
La malungu alo mfelandawonye ebevutha ngumsindo etyhola usodolophu uDumani Zozo ngolawulo olugwenxa.  
Kolu qhankqalazo kuthe kwangenelela nombutho wolutsha lweANC, bethetha ngazwilinye nalo mfelandawonye, bememelela ungenelelo olikhawulezileyo lweenkokheli zikazwelonke ukususa lo kaZozo esikhundleni sakhe.  
Bathi oko wangena uZozo akukho kwanto elungayo kulo Masipala. Bakhalazela inkunkuma egcwele ezitratweni, urhwaphilizo, ubuqhophololo nokwehliswa kwemali ngemilenze. Bakwatyhola kananjalo usodolophu ngokuba yinxalenye yabantu abatya imali yamalungiselelo yesingcwabo sikaTata uNelson Mandela, bekwanyanzelisa nokuba kubuyiswe imali engange R65 million eyadliwa ngondlelamnyama ngo2018 kulo Masipala.  
UMadyibhi othethela iSAMWU uthi kwizinto ebabevumelane ngazo banikwa iintsuku ezilishumi elinesine, ntsuku ezo ezaphela kunyaka ophelileyo.   
UMlanjeni weANCYL uthi into ebangela bangenelele kukuba ezi zinto zikhankanywa ngaba basebenzi zichaphazela ulutsha kwaye bona njengolutsha lombutho olawulayo kuluxanduva lwabo ukulwela amalungelo oluntu. 
Ngethuba sibhala le ngxelo amagosa alo masipala ebekwintlanganiso.

headline: UMalunga ukulungele ukubamba iintambo
text:
IMPUMELELO kwi-ofisi yoMkhuseli Woluntu ayixhomekekanga kumntu omnye, yintsebenziswano phakathi kwabasebenzi beliziko.  
Oku kuthethwe ngusekela Mkhuseli Woluntu kweli uAdvocate Kevin Malunga.  
UMalunga ukuluhlu lwabayi-59 ababhengezwe yiPalamente kugqatso lokungena ezihlangwini zoMkhuseli Woluntu oshiyayo * -Advocate Thuli Madonsela.  
UMadonsela uzakusishiya esi sikhundla ngo-Okthobha emva kweminyaka esixhenxe yexesha le-ofisi yoMkhuseli Woluntu.  
UMalunga uthi ukulungele ukuqhubekeka apho ashiye khona uMadonsela xa elinikwa elo thuba. “Ndineminyaka emithathu enesiqingatha ndikweli ziko, ndisebenze njengebambela loMkhuseli Woluntu izihlandlo ezingamashumi amathathu, ndihambe kwiindawo ngeendawo zasekuhlaleni kweli, ndaya nakwamanye amazwe ndimele eli ziko. Ndikhokele amaqela ophando, ndikwangusihlalo kwamanye wamasebe ethu.” 
 Ukwathe, ukusebenza njengoMkhuseli Woluntu ayingomsebenzi nje kuye, kukunika inkonzo kwisizwe ngeliqinisekisa urhulumento olululo, ukulwa nobuqhophololo, nokubona uluntu luxhamla kwiinkonzo elingazifumaniyo ngenxa yobuqhophololo.  
Uthe ukuba utyunjiwe uzakuqhubekeka nomsebenzi awuqhelileyo nokumilisela iimbono zakhe ngeli ziko. “Ngumnqweno wam ukuba sakhe kwisiseko sentembeko esiyinikwa luluntu,” utshilo okaMalunga.  
Ukwathe unenjongo yokuvula i-ofisi yesithathu yoMkhuseli Woluntu eMpuma Koloni. “Okwangoku sine ofisi eseBhisho neseMthatha, injongo yethu kukuvula eyesithathu eBhayi. Ndinqwenela nokuba siqinise ii-ofisi ezijikelezayo ezifikelela koomasipala abaliqela kweli.” 
 Uthe uninzi lwezikhalazo zoluntu zisuka koomasipala, uluntu lukhalazela ukuqhwalela kweenkonzo, izindlu zesibonelelo ezingekho mgangathweni nokuqeshana ngokwazana.  
UMalunga uqhube wathi, “Eyona ngxaki inkulu kukungalandelwa kwemithetho yenkqubo zokuthenga zaseburhulumenteni. Enye yezinto esizakugxila kuzo kukuxhobisa abaphandi kule ofisi ngemithetho elawula intengo yaseburhulumenteni,” utshilo okaMalunga.  
Wenze umzekelo ngezikhalazo ezijoliswe kumasebe aseburhulumenteni kweli phondo ngezityholo zokusebenzisa gwenxa intengo yaseburhulumenteni kumalungiselelo omngcwabo kaNelson Mandela.  
“Ihlazo lebholo lokutyiwa kwemali kumalungiselelo omngcwabo kaMandela kubonakalisa ukuba kukho abajonge ukutya xa besenza intengo yaseburhulumenteni,” ucacise ngelo.  
Ukwathe i-ofisi yoMkhuseli Woluntu mayingajongwa njengotshaba likarhulumente. “Asilwi tshaba norhulumente, silungisa iimpazamo zikarhulumente. Siphanda izikhalazo, sisebenzise ubungqina obuphambi kwethu,” uqhube watsho.  
Ukwathe abo banamathandabuzo ngakuye mabajonge isimo sakhe ngakubuqhophololo, “Andizange ndakhusela mntu ofunyaniswe enobuqhophololo,” utshilo okaMalunga.

headline: Ukhuselwa ngubani uMkhuseli woLuntu?
text:
Ininzi ke into eqhubeka pha phezulu kweli laseMzantsi Afrika. Asazi nokuba ngubani oleqa bani, emleqela ntoni, ngenxa kabani. Kodwa ecace gca yona yeyokuba ukhona lo mlo uliwayo. 
 Ewe, iANC yona iqhekekile, abangaphakathi bathi kudala kwaba njeya kodwa ke isisila senkukhu sibonwa mhla ligquthayo. Silapho ngoku. Kuyagqutha. Phakathi naphakathi kuso sonke esi siphithiphithi kukho noMkhuseli woLuntu, uBusisiwe Mkhwebane.  
Endaweni yokuphanda ukuxhatshazwa kwabantsundu kwiinkampani zabo babesakuba ngabacinezeli nokulandelela izikhalazo zoluntu, uqonde ukuba makahambe ayokuqala ngentloko yeli, uCyril Ramaphosa.  
Phofu ke nalapho ebeceliwe ukuba aphande emva kwamarhe obuqhophololo bemali yokugaya iivoti. Kubonakala ngathi umongameli weli uwuphumelele lowo umjikelo, kodwa ke kusafuneka exelele ipalamente ‘inyani’.  
Kwelinye icala kukho noMphathiswa wamaQumrhu kaRhulumente, uPravin Gordhan, othi uMkhuseli woLuntu ngomnye wabantu abahlakulela ukuba uMzantsi Afrika ubanjwe ngobhongwane ngoosomashishini abathile kweli.  
UGordhan ukutsho oku emva kokuba uMkhwebane ebhentsise, kwingxelo yakhe, ukuba uGordhan wayeyinxalenye yokusekwa kwecandelo labacuphi abangekho semthethweni pha kwaSARS ngo2007.  
Eyokuba ke lakhe lakhona eli candelo yenye yolunye nje usuku esaqhubayo nayo. Sibhala nje kukho ingxolo eninzi kumaqonga onxibelelwano ethi uMkhwebane makagxothwe, akafanelanga nokuba ukuluhlu lwabantu ekuthiwa ngamagqwetha kweli.  
Yena uMkhwebane ume kwelokuba wenza umsebenzi wakhe qha. Ayingomadoda nje la ajamelene nawo uMkhwebane; ngabantu abanamandla mpela kweli. Xa kunjalo iye ibe ngubani okhusela uMkhuseli woLuntu?  
Napha kwiNkundla yoMgaqosiseko ifane yaba nguMogoeng Mogoeng yedwa okwicala likaMkhwebane, ezinye iijaji ziyikhaba yonke lo nto. Kwakhona, siyabuza: ngubani okhusela uMkhuseli woLuntu xa kunje?  
Ngoba ngoku ubethwa ngemiqathango yokwenza izinto hayi ngokuba uthetha izinto ezingekhoyo ncam. Sakukhe siyibone le ukuba iya phi.

headline: Ufunwa ngapha nangapha ochithwe yiPirates!
text:
Obefudula edlala kwi-Orlando Pirates ufunwa ngamaqela aliqela emva kokuqhawulwa kwesivumelwano sakhe sengqesho. Ekuqaleni kwale veki iPirates ibhengeze ukuba yohlukene noPatrick Phungwayo emva kokuqhawulwa kwesivumelwano sakhe sengqesho. UPhungwayo, 29, ukhululekile ukuba azibandakanye nokuba leliphina iqela phambi kokuvalwa kwenyoba yokutyikitywa kwabadlali (kwiPSL) namhlanje. Lo mdlali waya kwiBucs esuka kwiBidvest Wits kwisithuba seminyaka emihlanu edlulileyo. 
“Isivumelwano sokohlukana phakathi kweqela noPatrick Phungwa kufikelelwe kuso ngesihle kwintlanganiso ebikhona. Sinqwenelela lo mdlali okuhle kodwa emva kokusebenzela thina ukusukela ngo’2012,” itshilo ingxelo ekhutshwe yiPirates aph’evekini. 
Nangona kwakulindeleke okokuba uPhungwayo agqame ekufikeni kwakhe kwiPirates – kodwa inkqubela yakhe yakhonkxwa kukumane esonzakala nokhuphiswano olukhoyo kwiPirates. Ngamashumi amahlanu anesithandathu (56) iyonke imidlalo ayidlalileyo kwiPirates ukusukela ngo’2012 – kodwa kwisizini ephelileyo ukwazile ukudlala imidlalo esondeleyo kumashumi amabini nangona ebekhuphisana namaxhwangusha afana noThabo Matlaba noMarc van Heerden. 
Uhlengahlengiso olwenziwa kwiPirates luza emva kokuba ivale isizini ka’2016/17 ikwindawo yeshumi elinanye futhi ingacholanga naphantsi kwiindebe ezidlalelweyo. Ukuhamba kukaPhungwayo kuze emva kokuhamba kuka-Oupa Manyisa othathwe yiMamelodi Sundowns phambi kokuqala kwale sizini iqhubayo. Iingxelo zithi uPhungwayo ufunwa yiSuperSport United neFree State Stars eqeqeshwa nguLuc Eymael. Ikamva lalo mdlali kulindeleke licace phambi kokuphela kosuku lwanamhlanje.

headline: USipho Mbule uthengiselwe iMamelodi Sundowns, utsho uMatthews
text:
Emva kokwenziwa amaqashiso ngekamva likaSipho Mbule ixesha elide, namhlanje ufumene ikhaya elitsha. Ngoku ungumdlali opheleleyo weMamelodi Sundowns. Oku kubhengezwe yiSuperSport United abeyidlalela ngentsasa yanamhlanje. Ukusukela ekuqaleni konyaka ka-2022, uMbule khange akwazi ukuyidlalela iSuperSport United emva kokusikwa ngabaphathi. Lo nto yenzeka emva kokuqhankqalaza kwakhe kuba wayefuna ukuhamba njengabadlali abafana noTeboho Mokoena odlalela iSundowns naye ngoku. Ngelo xesha umqeqeshi wakhe yayinguKaitano Tembo owagxothwayo naye ngenxa yeziphumo ezingancumisiyo. 
UMbule, 24, waqala ukudlalela iqela elikhulu ebholeni yaseMzantsi Afrika kwisizini ka-2015/16 kwiSuperSport United (Academy) esuka kwiVirginia Sports Academy. Ukusukela ngoko, uMbule udlalele Amatsatsantsa imidlalo emininzi kwaye ukwazile ukuwanceda aphumelela indebe yeMTN8 kabini. Wayekhona nangethuba iSuperSport ibethwa emdlalweni wokugqibela weCAF Confederation Cup phantsi kuka-Eric Tinkler ngonyaka ka-2017. “Oku kukwazisa ukuba iSuperSport United neMamelodi Sundowns zivumelelene ngokuthengiselana uSipho Mbule ongumdlali wasesiswini,” utshilo uStan Matthews. 
“Kusivisa kabuhlungu ukulahlekelwa ngumdlali onesiphiwo njengoSipho, ngakumbi kwikhabathiso akulo. Akukho nto esingayizamanga esemandleni wethu ebinokuguqula izinto – kodwa kwiinyanga ezigqithileyo kuye kwacaca ukuba ingqondo yakhe ayisekho kwiSuperSport United. Sibone kulungile ke ukohlukana naye ngesihle. Simnqwenelela okuhle kodwa kwaye sinethemba lokumbona eqhuba kakuhle kwiqela lakhe elitsha nakwiqela lesizwe,” utshilo uStan Matthews oyingqonyela yeSuperSport United. UMbule uwadlalele onke amaqela esizwe elizwe loMzantsi Afrika, ukusukela kwi-Under 17 ukuya kuBafana Bafana. Ngoku ulandela amadoda afana noMokoena noModiba.

headline: IDowns ihleli phezulu emva kokucambalalisa iBaroka
text:
IBaroka FC ibokoboko macala emva kokuba ivuthululwe yiMamelodi Sundowns ngo’4-0 kumdlalo we-Absa Premier Soccer League obuvutha bhe eLucas Moripe Stadium namhlanje ebusuku. Umqeqeshi weDowns, uPitso Mosimane, uthe ufuna iqela lakhe ufuna liphumelele ngamagowuli amaninzi namhlanje – abadlali bakhe benze kanye le nto ebeyifuna. Le mpumelelo yaMasandawana iwathathe yawabeka phezulu kwiPSL. Emva kwemidlalo elishumi ngoku iDowns inamanqaku alishumi elinethoba phantsi kwegama layo, ishiya iBaroka ehleli ixesha elide phezulu ngegowuli. Umdlalo okwinqanaba eliphezulu oveliswe liqela likaPitso kuthetha ukuthi ubunganga balo bubuyele kulo. Kulindekele le mpumelelo ibuyise ukuzithemba kubadlali beSundowns egqwidizileyo ekuqaleni kwale sizini ngenxa yokudinwa kwabadlali yimidlalo yeChampions League. 
Motjeka Madisha ungcangcazelise umnatha ngepenela emva kokuwiswa kukaSibusiso Vilakazi kumzuzu wesithathu kwisiqingatha sokuqala. Emva koko uThemba Zwane ufake igowuli lesibini emva kokufumana ibhola entle egotywe kwicala lasekhohlo. Abadlali beBaroka FC khange banikezele ngoba baqhubele phambili nokudlala umdlalo wabo wesiqhelo – kodwa ingxaki abathe bayifumana namhlanje kukuba iSundowns ayibanikanga ithuba lokuhlanganisa iibhola. Lo nto ibangele bangakwazi ukungena kumhlaba weDowns. UPercy Tau uvalelise ngamagowuli amabini – wavalwa umkhusane. Ngoku iSundowns ihleli phezulu kwiPSL emva kokucambalalisa iBaroka engadlala kakuhle namhlanje. Iya kumdlalo wayo olandelayo inamandla emva kokufumana inkuthazo kumdlalo wanamhlanje.

headline: Zishiyene kwanzima iimbaleki eQonce!
text:
Iimbaleki ezingaphaya kwamakhulu amathathu eziphuma kulo lonke iphondo leMpuma Koloni ziphume ngobunzi bazo ukuya kugqatso [umdyarho weembaleki] ezikhuphisene kulo ngokuyimpumelelo. Olu gqatso bekukhumbulwa ngalo umhla wamalungelo oluntu kwilizwe loMzantsi Afrika kweli phondo. Lo mnyhadala obuququzelelwe lisebe leZemidlalo, uLonwabo noBugcisa ububanjelwe eVictoria Grounds cebu kuhle kwidolophu yaseQonce ekuseni namhlanje. Kolu suku lubaluleke kangaka eli sebe likhokelwa nguMphathiswa uPemmy Majodina likhumbule iziganeko ezibini futhi ezibaluleke kakhulu kwimbali yomntu omnyama eMzantsi Afrika ukusukela ngeentsuku zomzabalazo ukuza lokuzuzwa kwenkululeko ngo’1994. 
                                 
Njengokuba kubhiyozelwe usuku lwamalungelo olungomhla wamashumi amabini ananye kweYokwindla [21, March], kwelinye icala kukwakhunjulwe notshotshentla kwezomzabalazo uSteve Bantu Biko – owasweka kwiminyaka engamashumi amane eyadlulayo emva kokubulawa nguRhulumente wobandlululo owawukhokelwa ngabantu abamhlophe. Umhla wamalungelo oluntu wabekelwa bucala emva ko’94 ukuze kukhunjulwe isiganeko ekwabhubha kuso abantu abamnyama abakumashumi amathandathu anethoba (69) bebulawa ngolunya ngamagosa omthetho kaRhulumente wobandlululo. 
Iimbaleki zeMpuma Koloni zidele loo mozulu ebingashushwanga ncam zaya kukhuphiswano obelunomtsalane kakhulu kwiimbaleki ezisafufuzayo nezo zindala. Phambi kokusuka kwazo ezi iimbaleki eVictoria Grounds, umphathiswa uMajodina, uzikhaphe ngamazwi wenkuthazo athi: “Xa ubaleka olu gqatso, uze ukhumbule uSteve Bantu Biko owalwela thina sonke ukuze sibe namalungelo.” 
                              
Iintombi nabafana ababaleke olu gqatso batyhutyha-tyhutyhe ezo zitalato zedolophi yaseQonce zade zayakufika entanjeni. Iziphulo zime ngolu hlobo:

headline: UGiovanni Solinas ubalula afuna kwenziwe liqela lakhe kule sizini
text:
Amakhosi aphose ithuba elihle lokuxolisa iintliziyo zabalandeli abanengcwangu emva kokuba ekhutshwe kwiMTN 8 izolo ebusuku. Igowuli elinye elifakwe kuBradley Grobler liyithathe iSuperSport United layibeka kumdlalo wokugqibela weMTN 8. Amatsatsantsa a Pitori abethe iKaizer Chiefs ngo’1-0 kumdlalo olawulwe ngawo ubukhuli becala eFNB Stadium kubusuku bayizolo. Ngokubethwa kwayo iChiefs, kuyiphosanise nethuba elihle lokuphumelela indebe yokuqala kwisizini entsha yePSL. Umqeqeshi weChiefs, uGiovanni Solinas, uphoxiwe kukubethwa kweqela lakhe – kodwa uthi kufuneka iqela lakhe lisebenze ngokuzimisela ukuze liphumelele iindebe. 
Kwizigaba zozibini zomdlalo, iChiefs ibingenalo ulwamvila kwaye nokubethwa kwayo akothusanga ngoba abadlali bayo ababonisanga kuyilangazelela impumelelo. “Isiqendu sokuqala besinzima kuthi ngoba indlela abadlali bethu abebenikelana ngayo ayisisebenzelanga. Ndingatsho ukuba umdlalo wethu ubungemhlanga kwisigaba sokuqala. Kubekho utshintsho kwisigaba sesibini ngoba sikwazile ukudala amathuba. Ngelishwa kuye kwafakwa igowuli kuthi – kodwa umdlalo wethu ubungcono,” utshilo uSolinas emva komdlalo. 
Nakubeni uSolinas engalifumananga ithuba lokulungiselela isizini entsha – kodwa uyazazi okokuba umsebenzi wakhe usemngciphekweni ukuba akakwazi ukuza nendebe. USolinas, ongene endaweni kaSteve Komphela, ufike iChiefs inethuba elingaphaya kweminyaka emithathu ingafumani zindebe. Kuba umdlalo wokuqala obuphakathi kweChiefs neSuperSport waphela ngo’2-2 eLucas Moripe Stadium, iChiefs bekufuneka ingabethwa qha emdlalweni – kodwa ngelishwa, yoyiswe kukukhusela amagowuli wayo nakukuphumelela. “Besinethuba elihle lokuya phambili kwindebe yeMTN 8. Ibibalulekile le ndebe kuthi. Kuyadakumbisa ukungayi kumdlalo wokugqibela. Kufuneka sisebenzi ngokuzimisela ngoba kule isizini kufuneka siphumelele iindebe. Kufuneka siphucule indlela esidlala ngayo,” utsho uSolinas.

headline: Uqhwatyelwe izandla uStephen Mokoka owenze imbali eGqeberha!
text:
Isidima selizwe loMzantsi Afrika sifunqukile kwicandelo lezeembaleki emva kokuva uStephen Mokoka enze iziqwenga emdyarhweni weembaleki obubanjelwe eGqeberha. UMokoka, 37, wenze imbali kwimpelaveki egqithileyo ngethuba ephumelela iNedbank Ultra Marathon engumgama ongamashumi amahlanu eekhilomitha (50km) ngexesha eliziiyure ezimbini, amashumi amane emizuzu nemizuzwana elishumi elinesithathu (2:40:13). Ngokwenza njalo, uMokoka wophule irekhodi lehlabathi elenziwa yimbaleki yaseTopiya (Ethiopia) egama linguKketema Negasa eyabaleka umgama ongamashumi amahlanu ngeeyure ezimbini ezinamashumi amane anesibini emizuzu nemizuzwana esixhenxe (2:42:07). 
Umsebenzi omkhulu owenziwe yile mbaleki yemigama emide yaseMahikeng, kwiphondo laseMntla Ntshona, uvunyuwe ngumbutho olawula ezembaleki, iWorld Athletics, wagqwatyelwa ngabantu abaninzi. Kusoloko kutshila iimbaleki zamanye amazwe kwimidyarho yeembaleki ebanjelwa eMzantsi Afrika. Yiyo le nto ukuphumelela kukaMokoka kwenze kwancasa kakhulu ebantwini belizwe lakhe. “Ndidinwe,” utshilo uMokoka emva kokuphuma entanjeni. Ngokokutsho kwakhe uMokoka, yena ebengacinganga ukuba angayiphumelela iNedbank Marathon. Uye eGqeberha ezilungiselele njengakweminye imidyarho yeembaleki aqhele ukuya kuyo. 
Ukwamkele kodwa ukuphumelela kwakhe nangona ethe iya kuthatha ixesha ukuze ingene engqondweni yakhe into yokuba nguye intshatsheli eyenze imbali. “Indlela ibinde kakhulu. Andazi nokuba ndiza kuziva njani emva kwalo mdyarho – kodwa bendiwonwabele. Phambi komdyarho, kukho iindlela entsha esiyizamileyo nomqeqeshi wam. Besifuna ukuvavanya yona kuba sifuna ukubona ukuba iza kusebenza na. Ndiyathemba ukuba indlela endibaleke ngayo ayindigqibanga amandla ngoba ndifuna ukuya kwiWorld Championship,” utshilo okaMokoka. Umongameli we-Athletics South Africa, uMnu. uJames Moloi, uvuyisene noMokoka emva kokwenza umsebenzi omhle. “Kusivuyise kakhulu ukubona iimbaleki zethu ziqhuba kakuhle ekhaya. Emva kokuphazanyiswa yiKhorona, ngoku sizama ukuza nemidyarho emininzi,” utshilo uMoloi.

headline: UMpengesi uyifuna kwiTop 8 iChippa
text:
Emva kokuthi khebevu emakhaya ngenxa yeeholide zokuphela konyaka, abadlali bamaqela adlala kwi-Absa Premier Soccer League babuyela emsebenzini kule veki.  
Iqela laseMpuma Koloni, iChippa United, lelinye lamaqela azakwakhelwa umkhanyo kakhulu ngabantu emva kokugqwidiza kwisizini ka-2016/17. Kodwa kule sizini izinto zibonakala zingcono nangoba zisekhona iindawana ezifuna ukuqhoshwa. 
 Usihlalo weChippa United, uSiviwe Mpengesi, ufuna iqela lakhe libe phakathi kwamaqela akwiTop 8 ekupheleni kwesizini futhi lizibekele indawo nakwiCaf. 
Oku kuphume kuMpengesi ngethuba esamkela izitshovu-tshovu zabadlali abane anethemba lokuba bakuthi bancedise ekuqinisekiseni ukuba injongo zalo ziyaphumelela.  
IiChilli Boys zamkele uNkosinathi Mthiyane, uThabo Rakhale, uMxolisi Machupu noLinda Mntambo. Ezinye iindaba ezimnandi kokubuya kukaRoger Sikhakhane ozakusebenza njengomncedisi kaTeboho Moloi. 
UMthiyane ngumdlali odlala ephikweni othembekileyo, wathathwa yi-Orlando Pirates kwiminyaka emibini edlulileyo emva kokugqwesa kwiChippa.  
URakhale ngumdlali onesiphiwo esingumangaliso ephikweni xa kuhlaselwa. Uzakusebenza noTeboho Moloi obesebenze naye kwiPirates ngaphambili. 
 UMachupu noMntambo basuka kwiJomo Cosmos, kulindeleke ukuba bancedise kakhulu phaya phambili kwicala lamagowuli.  
Aba badlali bongeza kwabanye abadlali abaninzi abatyikitywe leli qela phambi kokuqala kwale sizini – kodwa uMpengesi uthi ukufika kwaba badlali kubonisa ukuzimisela kwabo.  
“Ukutyikitya kwethu abadlali abane kubonisa mhlophe ukuzimisela kwethu ngokuqinisa indawo yethu kwiTop 8 nokunxanelwa kwethu ukudlala imidlalo yeCaf. Indlela adlala ngayo uRakhale ihambelana ncam neChippa. Siyamamkela noMthiyane. Eli lithuba lakhe lokuvuselela ikhono lakhe lokudlala ibhola kwaye iyayazi inkqubo yeChippa,” utshilo uMpengesi. 
IChippa United izakungquzulana naMaZulu kumdlalo wePSL ngentsimbi yesithathu emalanga ngeCawe eKing Zwelithini Stadium.  
Njengokuba iChippa ifuna amanqaku amathathu, wona AmaZulu azakube ekhangela indlela yokuziphindezela kwiChippa emva kokubethwa ekuqaleni kwesizini eBhayi.  
AmaZulu azinze kwindawo yeshumi elinanye, impumelelo ingawabeka endaweni engcono kakhulu.

headline: iTS Galaxy ivuthulule iGolden Arrows ngamagowuli amathathu ebaleni layo
text:
UDan “Dance” Malesela neqela lakhe benze ezibukwayo ngale njikalanga ngokubetha iGolden Arrows ebaleni layo emdlalweni obalulekileyo. Iqela elidlala kwiNational First Division, iTS Galaxy, lizenzele imbali ebholeni ekhatywayo eMzantsi Afrika namhlanje ngokuvuthulula Abafana Bes’thende ngamagowuli amathathu kwelinye (3-1) emdlalweni obutak’ iintlantsi kwisigaba sesibini eSugar Ray Stadium. USteve Komphela ubatyityimbisele umnwe abadlali bakhe phakathi evekini ngelithi baze bangayijongeli phantsi iTS Galaxy kuba idlala kwinqanaba elingezantsi. Kwenzeke lo nto kanye emva kokuba iGolden Arrows ingakwazanga ukukhusela igowuli layo ehambe phambili ngalo emdlalweni. Umdlalo ulawulwe yi-Arrows kwisigaba sokuqala – kodwa ayikwazanga ukubhalisa ebhedini kwade kwaphela isigaba sokuqala. 
Okuhle ngeTS Galaxy kukuba abadlali bayo khange banikezele noxa bekucaca ukuba badibene neqela elingasentla ngomgangatho. Iqela likaKomphela lihambe phambili emzuzwini wamshumi asixhenxe emva kwegowuli elifakwe nguKnox Mutizwa ngepenela evele ngenxa yokudlaliswa kakubi kukaMathenjwa. Unozinti weGolden Arrows, uMaximilian Mbaeva, unqande amanzi engena endlini izihlandlo eziliqela abadlali beGalaxy befuna int’ebilapha. Igowuli leGalaxy lithe gqi emva kwebhola efakwe nguSandile Zungu ngentloko ezama ukuyikhuphela ngaphandle. Kuye kwanyanzeleka okokuba umdlalo uye kwixesha elongezelelweyo. Kulapho uZakhele Lepasa efake khona amagowuli amabini aqinisekise indawo yeTS Galaxy emdlalweni wokugqibela weNedbank Cup oza kudlalelwa eMoses Mabhida Stadium kwinyanga ezayo.

headline: UBaxter uza kuvavanya abadlali abatsha eZambia
text:
IBafana Bafana izakube iyinxalenye yetumente yamazwe amane eqala ngoLwesine iphele ngeCawe kwilizwe laseZambia.  
Umqeqeshi weBafana, uStuart Baxter, uchonge abadlali abatsha abaliqela azimisele ukubanika ithuba lokudlala namazwe angoomakhelwane afana neZambia, iZimbabwe neAngola.  
Nakubeni uBaxter enomnqweno wokuvavanya abadlali abatsha ababizele kwiqela lesizwe – kodwa unoxanduva lokuqinisekisa ukuba wakha iqela eliluqilima.  
Njengokuba uMzantsi Afrika ungakwazanga ukuya kwindebe yehlabathi (2019 FIFA World Cup) ezakube iseRussia kwinyanga yeSilimela – ngoku umqeqeshi weBafana Bafana kufuneka aqinisekise ukuba ilizwe liyaya kwitumente yamazwe ezwekazi le Afrika (Africa Cup of Nations). 
UStuart Baxter yindoda engoyikiyo ukuzama izinto ezintsha ezinokuncedisana neqela – kodwa ngoba le midlalo ifike ngexesha elibi lokuphela kwesizini yePSL, kufuneka aqinisekise ukuba uyakuphepha ukonzakala kwabadlali.  
“Sigqibe kwelokuba sinike wonke umdlali ithuba lokudlala kule tumente. Andifuni uRamahlwe Mphahlele abuyele eqeleni lakhe edlale imidlalo emibini kwisithuba seentsuku ezintathu (utsho ezekelisa). Abadlali abadala babalulekile ngoba ngabo ababonisa indlela abatsha. Ndiyafuna ukuphumelela, nelizwe lilindele impumelelo kuthi – kodwa yonke into kufuneka siyenze ngononophelo,” utshilo uBaxter koonondaba ekuqaleni kwale veki. 
UMphahlele, ohleli iinyanga eziliqela ngaphandle kokudlala ibhola, ubuyela kwiqela likaBaxter emva kokudlala kakuhle kwiKaizer Chiefs. Lo kaMphahlele ngomnye wabadlali ekulindeleke kujongwe kubo xa iBafana Bafana izama ukuphumelela le tumente yamazwe amane. URama uthe iqela lisakhathazwe kukungayi kwiFIFA World Cup – kodwa wathi alikho ixesha lokuhlala kulo nto.  
“Xa ungumdlali kufuneka uvuthulule uye phambili emva kokuwa. Akufuneki abadlali abatsha basifumane sisathe khunubembe. Kufuneka sibakhuthaze ukuze bazibone ukuba bangalinceda iqela lesizwe,” utshilo uMphahlele. 
UMzantsi Afrika udibana neAngola kumdlalo wokuqala ngoLwesine ngentsimbi yesithathu, iZambia ixikixana neZimbabwe kumdlalo wokuqala ngentsimbi yokuqala eLevy Mwanawasa Stadium. 
Oonozinti: Itumeleng Khune, Darren Keet, Brendon Peterson. 
Abasemva: Reeve Frosler, Ramahlwe Mphahlele, Thulani Hlatshwayo, Motjeka Madisha, Daniel Cardoso, Buhle Mkhwanazi, Innocent Maela, S’fiso Hlanti. 
Esiswini: Dean Furman, Siphesihle Ndlovu, Kamohelo Mokotjo, Teboho Mokoena, Bongani Zungu, Aubrey Modiba, Sibusiso Vilakazi, Thembinkosi Lorch, Keagan Dolly, Phakamani Mahlambi, Themba Zwane

headline: Udukile umdlali weChiefs
text:
Akaziwa apho akhoyo umdlali weChiefs ngumqeqeshi.  
UJames Kotei kuthiwa uduke nezwe emva kokuvakala kwamahumhum athe uza kuthengiswa yiChiefs.  
Lo mdlali waseGhana ngomnye wabadlali abambalwa abagaleleka eNaturena phambi kokuqala kwesizini yePSL ka2019/20 kodwa yena akadlali kwiChiefs.  
Noxa wayebabazwa njengabamaziyo ekufikeni kwakhe eMzantsi Afrika, kodwa akakwazanga ukumelana nokhuphiswano lwamadoda afana noWillard Katsande noGeorge Maluleka.  
Ethetha neentatheli kutshanje, uErnst Middendorp uthe akamazi nokuba uphi uKotei kwaye akekho eNaturena.  
“Andingeze ndikwazi ukutsho ukuba uphi ngoba akekho apha. Andimazi apho akhoyo. Akekho apha namhlanje futhi nayizolo ebengekho,” utshilo uModdendorp ethetha eNaturena kwiveki ephelileyo.  
Kuthiwa iChiefs incwase ukumthengisa, endaweni yakhe ifake uAnthony Akumu waseKenya oshiye iZESCO United kutshanje.

headline: Mangweni: Iza kufika siyilindele iBoland!
text:
IBorder Bulldogs isebenzisa imidlalo yeSupersport Rugby Challenge njengamalungiselelo weCurrie Cup.  
Kwiveki ephelileyo, iBulldogs itywatyushwe yiWestern Province ngo’48-28 emdlalweni obuseOld Selbornian.  
Umqeqeshi weBulldogs, uTiger Mangweni, uthe iqela lakhe lizilungiselela imidlalo ezayo yeCurrie Cup.  
“Bendizilindele iziphumo ezinje kulo mdlalo. Ndiyazazi iingxaki ebesijongene nazo phambi kwetumente. Sendizixelele ukuba siza kusebenzisa le tumente njengamalungiselelo weCurrie Cup,” utshilo uMangweni. 
UMangweni uthe nangona iqela lakhe libethiwe kodwa kuninzi okuncomekayo kubadlali bakhe.  
“Uninzi lwaba badlali alinawo amava kweli zinga kodwa kuninzi ekuncomekayo abakwenzayo,” utshilo uMangweni. 
 IBulldogs yamkela iBoland Cavalliers emdlalweni wombhoxo eBuffalo City Stadium ebusuku ngoLwesihlanu. 
 “Imidlalo emibini esiyidlalileyo indibonisile into ekufuneka siyilungise nokuba siza kuyilungisa njani. IBoland iza kufika siyilindele,” utshilo uMangweni eqinisekile. 
IWestern Province iyiphumelele yomibini imidlalo yokuvula iSuperSport Challenge. Umqeqeshi weWestern Province, uJerome Paarwater, uthe bazimisele ukuyiphumelela iSuperSport Challenge. 
 “Isokolisile iBorder emdlalweni kodwa lo nto ibancedile abadlali bethu ukuze bazazi ukuba basemdlalweni. Zininzi iimpazamo abazenzileyo, nangona kunjalo, ndinalo ithemba lokuba sisesekhondweni elihle lokuyiphumelela iSuperSport Challenge,” utshilo uPaarwater. 
Komnye umdlalo, iEastern Province Elephants ibethe iSouth Western District Eagles ngo’59-24. Iziphumo zeSuper League ekwiBorder: Berlin Tigers 8-5 Buffs, WSU All Blacks 13-8 Breakers, United Brothers 36-0 Old Collegians, Ocean Sweepers 18-5 Ntlaza Lions.

headline: Umqeqeshi uvuyela abadlali baseGcuwa abaye eJamani
text:
Umqeqeshi weqela laseGcuwa, iThunderbirds Ladies, uchumulancile ngabadlali bakhe abahlanu abantingele eJamani kunye neqela lase Mpuma Koloni labasetyhini.UThembalethu Apleni uvuyela abadlali bakhe bachongwe yiSouth Africa Football Association (SAFA) ukuba babeyinxalenye yeqela le phondo eliyokudlala imidlalo yobuhlubo namaqela waseJamani. 
UMaxwele Siphosethu, Skeyi Siyamthanda,Nanasele Onelisa, uKeto Yonela kunye noDekeda Zimasa ngabadlali beThunderbirds Ladies, abachongiweyo. U-Apleni uthi ukuchongwa kwabadlali bakhe abahlanu kuchaza ukhula kwebhola yabo kwaye lonto uyayivuyela. 
“Ngo-2014 kwachongwa abadlali abathathu, kulo unyaka kuchongwe abahlanu nto leyo esichulumancisa kwaye esicinga ukub ibonakalisa ukuphucuka komngangatho wethu xa siwuthelekisa nakuqala” utshilo Apleni Kwisizini ephelileyo yeSasol Coastal Stream League, iintwazana zika-Apleni ziphethe isizini zihleli kwindawo yesibini kuluhlu lwamaqela ela nqanaba emva kokuba intshatheli yaba liqela laseBhayi, iCity Lads. Ukanti kulena isizini iThunderbirds Ladies sele 
 idlale imidlalo emithandathu yayiphumelele yonke kwaye abadlali bayo ababini, uZimasa Dekeda noNanasele Onelisa babizwe kwiqela lesizwe labasetyhini abaneminyaka engaphantsi kwamashumi amabini. Apleni uthi oko kucacisa mhlophe ukuba uxhomile umngangatho wabo kule sizini. Ngabadlali abalisumi elinesihlanu abathe bachongwa kumaqela awohlukeneyo eSasol Coastal Stream League /Sasol Inland Stream League ukuba bayokumela iphondo kwimidlalo emithatha yobuhlobo abazakuyidlala namaqela waseJamani. 
Abadlali bazakuchitha intsuku ezilishumi bekhenkethile kwilizwe laseJamani njengokuba benduluke ngoLwesihlanu kweli. Olu hamba lulandela intsebenziswano eyatyikitywa phantsi ngurhumente weli phondo kunye nowaseJamani ngenjongo zokwabelana ngolwazi malunga namagqiinga wokuphuhlisa imidlalo phakathi kwalamazwe mabani.

headline: MTN8: UStuart Baxter uncwase ukuvula ngeMamelodi Sundowns!
text:
Amaqela asibhoza akwiTop 8 aza kulwela indebe yeMTN 8 nezizigidi ezisibhozo zerandi (R8-m) emidlalweni ngempelaveki. Imidlalo yeMTN 8 itshayelela isizini entsha yeDStv Premiership eza kuqala kwiveki ezayo. Owona mdlalo ojongwe ngamehlo abomvu uphakathi kweMamelodi Sundowns neKaizer Chiefs ngentsimbi yesithathu emalanga ngeCawe, eLucas Moripe Stadium. Kulapho iSundowns iza kuzama khona ukufumana isiqalo esihle sendebe engekayiphumeleli nangona ikwazile ukuziphindaphinda ezinye iindebe kule minyaka elishumi igqithileyo. Umqeqeshi weDowns wesibini, uRulani Mokwena, uwuncomile umsebenzi owenziwe ngabadlali bakhe phambi kokuqala kwesizini watsho esongeza ngelithi bafuna ukwakha iqela eliza kuwasokolisa kakhulu amanye amaqela. “Amalungiselelo wesizini entsha ahambe kakuhle. Esikwenzayo ngoku kukunceda abadlali abatsha ukuze bakwazi ukuqhelana nendlela esisebenza ngayo,” utshilo uMokwena. 
Amasandawana afumene abadlali abaliqela kwaye kulindeleke athathe apho ayeke khona kwisizini egqithileyo ayivale ngendlela encumisayo. “Sifuna ukuba liqela elomeleleyo. Iqela eliza kubetha amanye amaqela ngeendlela ezininzi. Umgama esesiwuhambile uyasonelisa,” utshilo uMokwena. Emva kweminyaka engasafumani iindebe, Amakhosi akhwebe uStuart Baxter ukuze akwazi ukubuyisa isidima sawo. Okuhle ngeChiefs kukuba iya emdlalweni ikhuthazekile emva kokubetha iPirates emdlalweni weCarling Black Label Cup kwiveki ephelileyo. Akukho bani owaziyo kodwa ukuba ingayibetha na iSundowns ukuze inike ithemba abalandeli bayo abanxanelwe indebe. UBaxter uvumile ukuba iqela lakhe alikagqibeleli – kodwa ukuphumelela ingayinto entle. “Abadlali basebenza ngokuzimisela enkampini nangona singenalo kakuhle ixesha. Kunokwenzeka ukuhlangana kweqela kuthatha iiveki – kodwa ukuba singadlala kakuhle ngeCawe, mhlawumbi singalwela iindebe,” uthsilo uBaxter. 
Komnye umdlalo ngeCawe, AmaZulu adibana neCape Town City ngentsimbi yesithandathu emalanga eMoses Mabhida Stadium. Kwakutshayelela iGolden Arrows neSuperSport emdlalweni oyakube usePrincess Magogo Stadium ngo-15:00 ngoMgqibelo. Omnye umdlalo omkhulu ngophakathi kwe-Orlando Pirates neSwallows FC. Lo mdlalo ubekelwe intsimbi yesithandathu emalanga e-Orlando Stadium. Iinyoni zaseDube ziza kufuna ukuzicacisa emva kokudlala kakuhle kwisizini ephelileyo – kanti yona iPirates ifuna ukukhusela indebe yayo yokuqala phantsi kukaJosef Zinnbauer.

headline: ITexus ziintshatsheli ezivunyiweyo eMdantsane!
text:
Nangona iveki ephelileyo ibi yeyokuphumla kwabanye abantu – kodwa iinkokeli zoMdantsane Local Football Association bezixakekiswe luphuhliso lwabadlali abasakhasayo.  
Amaqela ebhola ekhatywayo anabadlali abadala ababalelwa kumashumi amane akhuphisene kwitumente ebiququzelelwe ngulo mbutho olawula ibhola eMdantsane.  
Le tumente ebixhaswa yiBuffalo City Municipality, ibiquka nehlokondiba lamaqela abadlali abaneminyaka engaphantsi kweshumi elinesithathu, ishumi elinesihlanu neshumi elinesixhenxe. 
Owona mdlalo obujongwe kakhulu ubuphakathi kweGreen Lovers neTexus.  
La maqela mabini athe azibonakalisa kule tumente ukuba ngawona anamandla kwibhola yaseMdantsane. Ngaphezulu kwazo zonke izinto ezenzekileyo kule tumente kukuba abadlali beelokishi ngokwahlukana kwazo bafumene ithuba lokuzivavanya nokuqaqambisa izakhono zabo.  
Umdlalo wamagqibela kankqoyi ubumhle futhi abadlali bamaqela omabini badlale ngokuzimisela. ITexus ibonisile ukuba ifuna ukuphumelela zisuka ngokuthi ifake amagowuli amabini kwisiqingatha sokuqala emdlalweni. 
Loo magowuli anike iTexus ithemba lokugoduka nendebe. Amagowuli alandele emva komdlalo omhle odlalwe ziziquququ zeTexus phantse sonke isiqingatha sokuqala.  
Emva kokufumana iingcebiso ngexesha lokuphumla, iGreen Lovers ibuye ngamandla kwisigaba sesibini. Abadlali baqale ngokudlala umdlalo odibeneyo besebenzisa izakhono zabo namendu.  
Uxinizelelo olufakwe yiLovers kwisigaba sesibini lulo olwenze yafumana amagowuli amabini ngokukhawuleza kwisigaba sesibini somdlalo.  
Lo nto inyanzele umdlalo ukuba uye kumapenela apho iTexus iphumelele ngo’4-3, yaba ithwaliswa isithsaba sobuntshatsheli ekupheleni kwemini. 
Nangona kungekho lula ukuqokelela ulutsha kule mihla – kodwa abaququzeleli bale tumente bonelisekile yindlela abaqhube ngayo. Amaqela aphumeleleyo ngokohlukana kwamanqanaba azuze iindebe, iimbasa nemali. 
Le tumente ibiliqonga elihle lokuqaqambisa izakhono zabadlali bebhola ekhatywayo.

headline: Faf: Lenze iimpazamo iqela, kodwa lilwile
text:
Ukapteni weProteas, uFaf du Plessis, uzivumile iimpazamo ezenziwe liqela lakhe emdlalweni elibethiweyo kuwo, kodwa uzingomba isifuba ngomsebenzi omhle owenziwe ngoogxa bakhe.  
UMzantsi Afrika uvuthululwe yiNgilane ngemitsi elikhulu elinamashumi asibhozo anethoba (189) emdlalweni wovavanyo obuseNewlands Stadium, eKapa.  
Iziphumo zomdlalo ogqithileyo zithetha ukuthi omabini amazwe aphumelele kabini kuchungechunge lwemidlalo yovavanyo esaya phambili.  
Amakhwenkwe oMzantsi Afrika aye emdlalweni ngoLwesibini wale veki efuna imitsi engaphaya kwamakhulu amathathu, kodwa akakwazanga ukuyifumana ngenxa yeempazamo nokukelema kwawo amaNgesi emdlalweni.  
Nangona kunjalo, uDu Plessis uya emdlalweni olandelayo enethemba emva komdlalo ophucukileyo weProteas. 
Phakathi emdlalweni, uKapteni noQuinton de Kock baphise ngoothinti ababini bonke, into enike amandla iNgilane ebizimisele kakhulu emdlalweni ewuphumeleleyo kakuhle.  
“Ukuphisa ngoothinti ababini ebaleni ebelisivumela kokona kwenze umahluko emdlalweni. Iqela lenze iimpazamo emdlalweni kodwa likwazile ukulwa kwelinye icala. Nakubeni kunjalo, ukuba ungajonga indlela ebesidlala ngayo kwisithuba senyanga ndingathi besingenalo tu ulwamvila.  
Njengeqela elinabadlali abatsha kwimidlalo yovavanyo, kodwa kukhona ukuphucuka okubonakalayo emdlalweni wethu. Yeyona nto ethe yandonwabisa leyo kwezi ntsuku zimbini zidlulileyo. Ngeke igqibelele ngokukhawuleza indlela esiqhokra ngayo kwaye neempazamo ziseza kubakho kodwa kwimidlalo yovavanyo, umntu kufuneka abenomonde zide zilunge izinto,” utshilo uDu Plessis emva komdlalo eKapa. 
Umdlalo olandelayo wovavanyo uya eBhayi ngomhla weshumi elinesithandathu. Owokugqibela uza kubanjelwa eGoli ngomhla wamashumi amabini anesine kule nyanga.  
Kulindeleke uMzantsi Afrika ulwe kube mdaka iisali ngoba uzama ukubuyisa isidima sawo emva kokukhululiswa ijezi kwakusasa kwiNdebe yeHlabathi kunyaka ophelileyo.

headline: Langeni: Sizakuzithatha zibembini iindebe kule sizini
text:
Omnye wabalandeli beKaizer Chiefs abaphambili kwimicimbi yabalandeli kwi-East London Kaizer Chiefs Supporters Branch ulithembile iqela lakhe ukuba lakuthi lenze ngcono kule sizini.  
USiyasanga “Sandla” Langeni waseGcuwa kodwa ohlala eMonti usibalisela ngendlela yakhe njengomlandeli weKhosi. 
Pedro Mapelo: Siyakwamkela kweli phephandaba. 
Siyasanga “Sandla” Langeni: Ndiyabulela kakhulu Bhuti. 
PM: Gqaba-gqaba, watsalwa yintoni apha kwiChiefs? 
SL: Mna ndingatsho ukuthi ndikhulele ekhayeni eliyilandelayo ibhola ekhatywayo futhi elinabantu abathanda iChiefs.  
Njengomntu okhule noosisi, iChiefs ibindinika la nto yokoyama. Kodwa eyona nto ibalulekileyo yimfundiso yaMakhosi: uthando noxolo, ezo zinto zindenza ndibambelele kakhulu kuwo. 
PM: Kubaluleke ngantoni ukuzibandakanya namasebe abalandeli (Supporters Branches)? 
SL: Kula masebe abalandeli siyafundisana ngeendlela zokwenza izinto, siyancedana kakhulu ngoba singabantu sahlukene: abanye abantu banezinto logama abanye behlelelekile.  
Enye into emnandi kukuba isebe labalandeli yeyona ndawo ibalinganisayo abantu. Siyakholelwa kakhulu ekuncedaneni thina. 
PM: Ulindele ntoni kwiChiefs kule sizini? 
SL: Ndiqinisekile, kule sizini sizakuyifumana indebe yePSL. Kwezishiyekileyo ngoku singafumana ezimbini kule sizini. Sizakuqala ngeTelkom Knockout le. 
PM: Kutheni abalandeli bengayi nje emidlalweni? 
SL: Phakathi kweengxaki abahlangabezana nazo abalandeli bebhola yindlela yokuya emabaleni: phakathi evekini kunzima ukufumana izinto zokhwela eziya kwiindawo abahlala kuzo.  
Lo mba ufuna kubekho ingxoxo phakathi kukarhulumente nabaphetheyo ebholeni. Enye into ebalekisa abantu yibhola enomtsalane edlalwayo ngamaqela akwiPSL kule mihla.

headline: ULukhanyo yinkokheli entsha yeCell C Sharks!
text:
Zisuka nje enyakeni omtsha, uLukhanyo Am unyuselwe liqela lakhe. Indodana yakwa-Am, 26, ibekwe ngokusesikweni njengoKapteni omtsha weCell C Sharks phambi kokuqala kwesizini yeSuper Rugby yalo nyaka.  
Ukunikwa kukaLukhanyo uxanduva lokukhokela iqela lombhoxo laseThekwini kwenzeka kanye emva kokuba encede AmaBhokobhoko aphumelele iNdebe yeHlabathi ekuzeni kuphela kuka2019.  
Le ndedeba, ephuma eQonce kwiphondo leMpuma Koloni, yaqala ukuziqaqambisa embhoxweni kwiBorder Bulldogs waze waya kwiSouthern Kings ezinze eBhayi phambi kokuya kwiSharks, emva kwesithuba esingunyaka kwakucaca okokuba isakhono sakhe sokudlala umbhoxo siyakhula.  
Isibhengezo ngokunyuselwa kukaLukhanyo asothusanga ngoba ungumdlali ozimiseleyo kakhulu emsebenzini wakhe kwaye samkelwe ngovuyo olukhulu ngabalandeli bombhoxo elizweni jikelele. 
Naye uLukhanyo ukwamkele ngovuyo ukunikwa kwakhe umsebenzi wokukhokela elinye lamaqela aphambili embhoxweni waseMzantsi Afrika.  
“Ukuchongwa kwam liwonga elikhulu. Sineqela eliluqilima, elimanyeneyo nelinabadlali abazimisele ukwenza umahluko obonakalayo. Siza kuqinisekisa okokuba kuyo yonke into esiyenzayo, sibeka iqela phambili,” uthethe loo mazwi uLukhanyo emva kokuchongwa kwakhe kwiSharks.  
Umqeqeshi weSharks, uSean Everitt, ubalule ukuzinikela kukaLukhanyo njengenye yezinto ezithe zanefuthe kwisigqibo sokunikwa kwakhe isikhundla esiphezulu. 
 “ULukhanyo simkhethe kuba engumdlali oqheleneyo nempumelelo, unefuthe eqeleni kwaye ungumntu ozinikeleyo kwiCell C Sharks. Andithandabuzi nakancinci, abadlali abasakhulayo baza kukhuthazeka sisikhokelo sakhe. ULukhanyo uza kuncediswa ngabanye abadlali abaziinkokeli,” utshilo umqeqeshi. 
USean Everitt uthe abadlali abafana noLouis Schreuder, uAndre Esterhuizen, uMakazole Mapimpi, uThomas du Toit noCurwin Bosch baza kuqinisekisa okokuba uLukhanyo ufumana inkxaso epheleleyo xa kufuneka kuthathwe izigqibo ezibalulekileyo kwiCell C Sharks imidlalo yesizini ka2020 yonke.

headline: IChippa United imkhombise umnyango uClinton Larsen
text: Ezingenayo ngale ntsasa zithi iChippa United imkhombise umnyango umqeqeshi wayo, uClinton Larsen. Ukugxothwa kukaLarsen kulandela ukubethwa kweChippa United ngo’2-1 emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership obubanjelwe e-Orlando Stadium ngoMgqibelo odlulileyo. ULarsen ugxothwa emva kwemidlalo emihlanu qha kwaye iChippa liqela lokuqala kwiPSL eseligxothe umqeqeshi ukusukela oko kuqale isizini entsha. Ihleli kwindawo yeshumi elinesithathu iChippa emva kokudlala ntanganye emidlalweni emithathu nokuphulukana nemidlalo emibini. Ngokwengxelo ekhutshwe yiKickOff.com, uLarsen uthi ugxothwe ngenxa yeziphumo.

headline: Kuncedwa ulutsha ngemidlalo eCawa
text:
Iqhubele phambili imidlalo yeNdlambe Netball League eyenziwe ngamaqela asibhozo kummandla waseNdlambe. Le Ndlambe League iqale kwinyanga engaphaya kwale iphelileyo. 
 Umlawuli weNdlambe League, uSiphokazi Mkrakra, uxelele iintatheli ukuba uncedo balufumene kumasipala, yiyo lo nto imidlalo eTiti Jonas Stadium/Ground kwindawo yaseNdlovini.  
Uqhube wathi amaqela asuka kwiindawo ezingaphandle kweCawa aqashelwa izithuthi lisebe leZemidlalo.” Lo kaMkrakra ukwaveze ukuba zininzi izinto abangenazo ingakumbi amanzi okusela xa abadlali bedlala.  
Utsho esithi unobangela wokuba kubekhona iNdlambe Netball League kule ndawo kungokuba bafuna ukuqokelela ulutsha ndaweninye futhi bakholelwa ukuba ezemidlalo zenza ludlalele kude ezintweni ezingalunganga, kwaye zikwagcina nemizimba isempilweni. 
 Iqela elihamba phambili kula maqela yiVintage Gels, iqela laseKenton, elithe laphumelela ngamanqaku alishumi elinesithathu(13) kwasixhenxe ngokuthi libethe iBarthust elikwindawo yesine. Iqela elibizwa ngokuba yi-Ukhanyo esemsileni, izinto zilihambele kakubi nanjengoko libethwe yiBucks ngamanqaku amathathu eqandeni.  
La maqela asibhozo abandakanyeka kwiNdlambe Netball League: yiFish River, Alex, Bucks, Ukhanyo, Port Alfred Masters, Amaqhawe, Vintage neBarthust. Amaqhawe abethwe yiPA Masters ngamagowuli alishumi elinanye kwasibhozo likhalazele iPA Masters ngokuhlala idlalisa abadlali engengabo abayo oko.  
UZandile Memani, umdlali waMaqhawe, eveze ukuba eli qela ngumkhwa walo ukusoloko lidlalisa abadlali engengabo abalo. Umqeqeshi wePA Masters, uNobesuthu Magquntule, khange akhanyele kodwa engakhe avume kukuba abadlali beqela lakhe bahambele eCawa.
